overview: Pleasant originates from the southeastern United States and is an alumnus of School of Visual Arts. Pleasant has travelled for over fifteen years. Having resided for extended periods of time in Scandinavia, Central and Eastern Europe and other locales. His various travels have helped to inspire him in his creations and introduce a dimension of genuineness and real life experience into his paintings, installation and graphic design works. This is reflected in the designers digital medium and adds a dimension of eye-catching uniqueness to the digital process.
